title: Liliana1304
author: Liliana1304
content: Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele has been suspended with immediate effect on Friday over an ongoing investigation into the matter of the new naira redesign policy and in his absence, deputy governor, Folashodun Shonubi has been put as acting governor. For every naija person, dis issue of the naira redesign policy no be new tin as we all experience the hardship wey the tin cause and for one news wey bin release,  former presido dey beg naija pipo to no vex, say e no no say d naira wahala go cause kata kataÂ For Godwin's defense, e say d naira redesign purpose na to stop mago mago for election wey go stop am from bin free and fair. As mata dey like dis, e go dey probed for him actions. How una see dis issue? This him suspension nah case wey dey long over due or he's just being the sacrificial lamb?https://www.channelstv.com/2023/06/09/tinubu-suspends-emefiele/

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: Liliana1304 on June 10, 2023, 05:29:47 AMFor Godwin's defense, e say d naira redesign purpose na to stop mago mago for election wey go stop am from bin free and fair.What I thought Godwin Emiefele said was that naira redesign will enable the CBN to have more control on naira circulation in the country, helping in discouraging ransom payment, help to reduce inflation and to help fight against naira counterfeit.But people thought that it would help against manipulation during the last election. Some people speculated that if Tinubu becomes the president that it would be reversed and old naira notes would be spent with the new naira notes. But the court reversed the CBN naira redesign that caused suffering in Nigeria at the time. That was not long after the election, but before Tinubu was sworn in as the president.Quote from: Liliana1304 on June 10, 2023, 05:29:47 AMAs mata dey like dis, e go dey probed for him actions. How una see dis issue? This him suspension nah case wey dey long over due or he's just being the sacrificial lamb?Nigeria news was boring for me to read at that time and I was frustrated over what was happening in the country at the time as Nigeria completing becoming something else as people suffered more. But I read that 3 trillion or so of old naira was gotten from people and removed from circulation, but only 400 billion naira was redistributed at the time, into circulation. Which we should expect hardship for, and what that happened. After the court said people should be spending old notes with the new notes, and later as CBN told banks to follow the court order, the old naira notes I first collected in banks were all very new, clean and like what has not be spent before. The new notes (the one that was redesigned) were not as plenty as the old notes.Recently, in every 100 old notes, hardly will you see 2 new notes among. So what did CBN used the money for redesign for? Also hope he did not has hidden plan?Or maybe some people release their old notes to CBN that time and into circulation while storing new notes now that causing it. Let the government probe Emiefele, but I wish the government should do it right to know if he is guilty of misappropriation or not.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Personally I no see any better thing wey go come out for him arrest because for all the mago mago wey happen for the new naira redesign our former president Buhari been dey Emefiele back and I feel say if BAT wam investigate the matter properly then the former president should also be arrested along with the CBN governor so that they will explain to Nigerians what dey did with the money dey said they used to redesign new note that we are not seeing.I think the arrest of the CBN governor is just a way of getting back at him maybe because BAT feels the new note that was introduced during the election season was done against him but I believe we will wait to see and hear the explanation of Emefiele but believe this the matter will only go no where because BAT will appoint a new CBN governor that will also be in his favour and the former CBN governor will later regain his freedom. Naija na cruise and dem go just dey play us make we know understand wetin dem dey do.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: For me, I see the whole matter as political, because I can remember vividly well that before the election, Â there was a rumor that the main aim of that newly designed Naira note & withdrawal of old notes from circulation was to prevent "Bola Ahmed Tinubu" from having the means to buy vote on Election Day & not the other cock & bull stories they claimed to have said, and Tinubu knew it very well and played his game the smart way which finally made him emerge the president of the federal Republic of Nigeria. So with that alone, I think was enough reason for President "Bola Tinubu" to have had him in mind since & long to have had him pay for what he did, which is what I see is happening right now. Because when it comes to corruption, Godwin Emefiele is not the first to have been mentioned to have mismanaged public fund. So why is he the first to be probe & arrested by DSS? You just think am.But that's my view on this, I don't know about yours

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: I would have expected that a long time ago the worst CBN governor in Nigerian history will have been sent parking but for reasons best known to the Buhari they kept him in office despite all the signs that he was not good enough to handle that office. No he has been suspended, there is no way back for him. But then, the man has stolen enough to live well after all the dust has died down. Well, I don't know about you but I am not surprised about his arrest by the DSS. Remember some months back when DSS was on his trail he had snuck out of the country when he was accused of funding terrorism. He had good intention because he wanted the terrorist to leave the farmers alone so that they can go to their farms and be able to repay their loans which was given to them by the CBN but then, as long as he gave the bandits money for it, it is funding of terrorist no matter his good intention. Another allegation he faced was the stamp duty charges which he is being invested by the DSS. They accuse him of turning a blind eye because he's colleagues in the banks were refusing to remit stamp duty charges from the thousand of transaction made by the banks. You know why I do not pity him? It is because he is a selfish man who instead would have done his bit to fix the economy was pleasing himself and the his political godfathers. I would never forget how he went about business - AbokiFx and freeze the funds in young Nigerians who were protesting, including the ban on cryptocurrency transactions. Also he gave out too many loans than Nigeria has ever had to the government and was not independent from them, Now they have thrown him under the bus. Sadly, this is Nigeria and we know nothing would happen to him.

comments.body: He might even serve a jail term because the man really suffered Nigerians and indirectly was working for an ethnic group to... If fuel, cement and and dollar prices come down then the prices of goods and services will drastically come down to the poor man level. I can still remember when coke was #25. I pray. The CBN president was one of the person that was suffering Nigerians.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: You know, it's sad to know that a man who caused the sufferings of so many Nigerians is just being held in custody and has not been sent to prison already. Knowing these politicians, this matter would make headlines for a while then it's forgotten. Personally, if the president is serious about judging the matter, the ex president should be probed and taken into custody because he too is not guiltless.

comments.body: The thing is that our country is too open for anyone to come maneuver the way they want and thought off, so does it mean that all those hardship we passed through this Naira redesign was just for a sole purpose of a free and fair election that made people go through hell and for us to get our money we pay some certain percentages for one to get money. What I sense here was a deliberate act and they should sake him for jeopardizing his office as the Governor. As an office holder before going out implement whatever thing it should be that you seat with all the body's and come to a final conclusion with everyone before taking it upon the president for implementation.

We all know how former president Buhari stood behind him. He has served his country and even though we know some things are not clear fact, like how he managed to throw a whole country into jeopardy at a very crucial time, with the Naira redesign and other stringent new banking policies that were and is partly the result of why the Dollar rate was high, almost about #760 -$1. We as citizens at least know we would get to see the drama that would unfold and heave a sigh of relief or disgust in the end.The DSS that was reported to carry out the arrest, now say they do not have him in custody, the confusion has just started o. The issue should be how to settle the economy right now though, with looming strikes, hike in fares and charges, pressing debt margin, removing the CBN governor anyhow is just the right move, ahbeg.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Liliana1304 on June 10, 2023, 05:29:47 AMGovernor of the Central Bank of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele has been suspended with immediate effect on Friday over an ongoing investigation into the matter of the new naira redesign policy...The truth is he never would have acted on his own, he had backing, but right now he is being sacrificed because he tried to work against the new government entering and against some elites that he made to loose some money that they had saved away from the banks when he announced the new naira designs. He was not just suspended but was also arrested by DSS personnels for investigation, same DSS that has failed to investigate INEC and it's Oga in the midst of the many proofs of serious corruption, and also failed to investigate the scam Nigeria Air project.I pity Mr Godwin Emiefiele, everyone is angry with him because he put many Nigerians through many unimaginable suffering that period. He is in a lot of trouble because they are also linking him with claims of Financing terrorism.

comments.body: Quote from: Liliana1304 on June 10, 2023, 05:29:47 AM For Godwin's defense, e say d naira redesign purpose na to stop mago mago for election wey go stop am from bin free and fair. As mata dey like dis, e go dey probed for him actions. How una see dis issue? This him suspension nah case wey dey long over due or he's just being the sacrificial lamb?https://www.channelstv.com/2023/06/09/tinubu-suspends-emefiele/See ehh this Tinubu election winning has nothing to do with the party as dem self no been dey support am. Na the man compass give am the election and even that CBN governor was against Tinubu. Rumour been dey say the new naira note was just to stop tinubu from bribing his way into the office. Dem forget say baba na baba instead of buying vote, him buy INEC directly and other statesman like wike and the rest. Plus him loyalist dem payback all him dun do for them. Tinubu won the election without the full support of the APC governments so na payback time. The CBN governor na just the first step. If you think the redesign policy no get anything to do with tinubu why dem abandon the new note immediately him win.There was no need to redesign the new note and wasted trillions of Nigeria money if you know say the thing no go work. What was then the use of the resign if we no see new note use and now the old note is back into circulation. The CBN governor needs to be investigated and persecuted if found guilty. Weda na personal attack or not, he did Nigeria dirty and need to be dealt with. You know how many people lose their jobs, life, love ones just because dem no get access to Naira. Make nobody pity The CBN governor, he desire whatever punishment he gets but I trust Nigerian politicians na, dem go find way resolved am wetin demselves without caring about how Nigerian feel about the whole situation.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: The way I take the see Godwin Emefiele case about the new naira design palava na payback time in the hands of Tinubu. Nigerians know sae the main reason for the new naira design is to sabotage Tinubu's ambition of successfully becoming the president of Nigeria but it later did not work as Tinubu end up becoming the president. Now wey Tinubu don become president of Nigeria, Godwin Emefiele don become a scapegoat give am after avoiding arrest from DSS hands for a long because of the immunity wey cover am as CBN governor. News wey go d on for Nigeria be sae, Godwin Emefiele is arrested by DSS and em d on their custody and different allegations of financing terrorism and corruption especially in the dual exchange rate policy which no make sense were all brought before him to defend.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Although I have never supported president Bola Ahmed Tinubu during his campaign and even after getting elected the president and also the electoral process was very much questionable regardless I am personally impressed by him removing/suspending the CBN governor.Since his appointment as the CBN governor for a very long time Nigeria has not yet known any for of progress in the financial sector and the implementation of the last new naira note that caused hardship in the country was the last straw that broke the camel's back.
